name: Slightly Magic
description: Slightly Magic is an arcade adventure computer game published in 1991 by Codemasters for the Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum. It was written by Colin Jones, author of the rock star management game Rock Star Ate My Hamster (also for Codemasters). Colin later became known as author and publisher Colin Bradshaw-Jones.
